snippet: Companies reported less business activity and did not raise their prices, while a few even charged less.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management survey of United States service companies show industry expanded at slower pace in April than in March, as companies reported less business activity and were unable to raise prices.
lead_paragraph: Companies reported less business activity and did not raise their prices, while a few even charged less.

headline.main: Service Industry Expanded in April, but at Slower Pace
headline.print_headline: Service Industry Expanded In April, but at Slower Pace
